From: Krishneel Chauhan <krish@pureseo.com>
Date: Wednesday, 13 August 2025 at 4:28 pm
To: Grant Gilroy <grantg@trueline.net.au>, Shane Hammond <shaneh@trueline.net.au>
Cc: Mitch Day <Mitchd@trueline.net.au>
Subject: Re: Ad Messaging

Hi Grant,

I believe we have always got the most success with someone kind of promotion within the wording. Winter or Summer etc.

We have also run a 20% off promo previously. Which worked kind of the same, because there is no pricing listed on the site. Just depends how you want your sales staff to approach it.

Just asked the 'robots' and got the following suggestions;

1. Emphasise Architectural Excellence & Innovation

  • "Elevate Your Outdoor Living with Trueline's Architectural Designs"
  • "Innovative Rooflines, Superior Comfort-Experience Trueline's Fly‑Over & Insulated Patios"
     (References to Trueline's pioneering fly‑over roofs and insulated offerings )

2. Highlight Quality, Durability & Local Craftsmanship

  • "Built for Australian Climate, Crafted for Your Home - Discover the Trueline Difference"
  • "Custom Outdoor Living-Australian Materials, Unmatched Durability"
     (Reflects Trueline's use of premium Australian-made materials and decades of experience )

3. Promote the Seamless, All-Inclusive Service

  • "From Free Design Consultation to Council Approval-Enjoy Trueline's Stress‑Free Process"
  • "Your Project, Handled: Design, Approvals & Build-Simply Relax"
     (Mirrors their full-service approach with free in-home quotes and council liaison )

4. Showcase Adaptable, Year-Round Outdoor Solutions

  • "Stylish Shade in Summer, Weatherproof Comfort in Winter-Trueline Has You Covered"
  • "Live Outdoors in Any Season with Trueline's Insulated & Louvred Designs"
     (Plays on the versatility of insulated and louvred patio options )

5. Focus on Customisation and Personal Style

  • "Tailored to Your Taste: Bespoke Patios, Carports & Verandahs by Trueline"
  • "Your Style, Your Space-Trueline's Custom Outdoor Structures Designed for You"
     (Reflects Trueline's commitment to custom designs )

6. Leverage Legacy & Reputation

  • "Over 75,000 Outdoor Spaces Built Since 1970-Trueline, Trusted for Generations"
  • "Family‑Owned for 50+ Years-Excellence in Outdoor Living by Trueline"
     (Highlights their experience and customer trust

Kind Regards,

Krish

Doing Digital The Right Way.

Krish Chauhan | Director

Pure SEO HQ: 1341 Dandenong Rd, Chadstone
 VIC 3148
